mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Proof by Fingers"; 02 of 03
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 7; "Proof by Fingers"; Discusses giving credit to Henry Faulds's claim of being the first to mention the fingerprint identification method. The author references and examples Faulds's publication "Guide to Finger-print Identification" while discussing fingerprint identification.; by T.H. The Law Times; DF 654
